event.title: will be held on Saturday, March 14, 2009

data.event: Memorial services will be held on Saturday, March 14, 2009, at 3 p.m. in the Kreamer Funeral Home and Crematory, 618 E. Main Street, Annville.
Visitation will be held on Saturday from 2-3 p.m., prior to the service at the funeral home.
